Description:
Perfect Location
Welcome to Lot 2053 (141) Lennon Parkway, Derrimut.
Located in a premier location within the heart of Derrimut and in an established and desirable neighbourhood, this great allotment gives you the opportunity to build the home of your dreams. Nestled amongst beautiful homes and close to all amenities this prime allotment is titled and ready to build on now - be quick as this won’t last long!
* Land size of 560 sqm (approx)
* Wide frontage of 16 metres (approx)
* East/west orientation
* Titled and ready to build on
* Close to all amenities including Derrimut Village, public transport, schools and childcare and easy access to freeway
* Only 18Km to CBD
* Picture and plan for illustration purposes only
Insights: 141 Lennon Parkway, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
An Irresistible Oasis
Live with as-new brilliance in this substantial family home, completed to an uncompromising standard throughout. Appointed to an discerning criteria throughout, an interior fitted up to a quality, not down to a price, introduces multi-zone living of the highest order with refined sitting room, expansive rumpus room and a vast family living zone that incorporates a kitchen designed to ignite the inner Masterchef. 900 mm freestanding Cooker, dishwasher, glass splashbacks, quality cabinetry, stone benchtops and a fitted butlers pantry combine to meet the meal time needs of the most demanding family. The sumptuous main bedroom features a retreat and fitted his and hers dressing walk in robe behind a luxury ensuite that includes a oversized shower. Three further bedrooms are well served by a central bathroom. Those with a love of outdoor dining and entertaining will make the most of the alfresco area. Stretching out from the casual living, set in landscaped surrounds and complete with a stunning water feature, there probably isn't a better place to while away a summers night. The oversized double garage is complemented with drive through access. Add in a long of list of desired inclusions, among them ducted heating, evaporative cooling, plantation shutters throughout, Bi-Fold Doors, alarm, Roller shutters, downlights, high ceilings, high doors, Video cameras, outdoor lights, landscaped front and rear gardens, window and door deadlocks, views of Bothwell Park and you have an irresistible family oasis.
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION***

Description:
Five Bedroom Home On A Large Block
With an endless amount of options this brick veneer home is just ideal for the large or growing family with an abundance of space inside and out.
Comprising five bedrooms (4 on the upper level and 1 on the ground floor) all offering built-in robes and master with walk-in robe and full ensuite. The remaining of this 40square beauty consists of formal lounge and dining area, retreat to the upper level, separate family room and family meals area being separated by the spacious kitchen which includes stainless steel cooking appliances, double door pantry, amble bench and cupboard space.
This home also includes ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large pergola and all set upon a huge allotment measuring approximately 722sqm and within close proximity to public transport, Derrimut Primary School, St Lawrence Primary School, local parks and sporting grounds, Sunshine Golf Club, Derrimut Village shopping centre and easy freeway access. What more could your growing family need?
Insights: 6 Menzies Promenade, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
THE REGATTA - QUALITY BUILT PORTER DAVIS HOME
Defined by modern elegance with quality finishings and generous internals, this Porter Davis home is further enhanced by its superb Derrimut location.
Upon entry you'll be greeted with a wide entrance hall, high ceilings and a fully tiled living & dining area. This well kept family residence sits on approx 420 sqm of land & has plenty to offer.
Featuring -
- 4 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, master with walk in robe and private ensuite bathroom with double vanity
- Huge fully tiled living & dining area
- A chefs kitchen complete with huge island bench, walk in pantry, ample cupboard storage, Bellissimo 900mm stainless steel appliances inc gas cook top, oven and 900 mm stainless steel range-hood & dishwasher
- Undercover timber decked entertainment area
- An additional bathroom with seperate powder room
- Walk in laundry with 45 litre trough & rear yard access
- Additional living or rumpus room
- Gas Ducted heating/Evaporative cooling and split system heating/cooling in master
- 175 Litre Solar hot water system
- Low maintenance rear yard approx 4X12 metres
- Double garage remote garage with internal and rear access
Location -
- Plenty of private and public schooling options available
- Derrimut Village shopping centre only moments away
- walking distance to bus stops and short commute to Deer park railway station
- Opposite Bothwell Green reserve with plenty of green space and a park for the kids
- Easy access to main roads and Western Ringroad
The Regatta by Porter Davis is truly a quality built family home. A great opportunity to lock in a price for those seeking a premium home in a Derrimut location that's continuing to climb in value or looking to upgrade for a growing family, this could be the home for you.
- PHOTO ID REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION
- List of inclusions available upon request
Insights: 23 Hermitage Parade, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Perfect Family HomeNot to be Missed!!!
A peaceful family sanctuary set on a beautiful garden allotment, this modern home offer effortless lifestyle in a peaceful setting. Build by Dennis Family homes, this impeccable family entertainer, with its versatile floor-plan and quality features throughout, provides a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle in one of the area's most popular estate. This picturesque 4 bedrooms, two-bathroom beautiful home is in the most in demand location and close to all the amenities.
This immaculate north facing home has beautiful landscaped front yard offering stunning views. With free-flowing floor plan, at the front is formal lounge room followed by large family area boasting European style kitchen with breakfast bench top. The double size master bedroom includes en-suite and large walk in robe. The other three good size bedrooms with build in robes offers comfort and lifestyle. The study cum kids retreat and huge enclosed pergola with garden views offer relaxing family entertainment. Distinguished by the distinctive grace of its original features, the property is further enhanced by its impressive 504sqm (approx.) allotment.
Other features of the home include double garage with drive through access, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, 3 kilo watt solar power system and backyard storage shed, smoke alarms in living areas. This property is 26 km approx. from CBD and is close to all amenities including school, child-care, public transport, shopping center, parks, playground, walk in trail and medical center.
Features of the Beautiful Quality Home include:
• Master bedroom with spacious walk in robe and en-suite with extra-shower area
• Three good sized bedrooms with build in robes
• European style kitchen with breakfast bench top and double door pantry
• Formal lounge and retreat area offering stunning garden views
• Ducted heating system
• Split air conditioning system
• Smoke alarm system in all living rooms
• 3 Kilo watts solar power system
• European style venetian blinds
• Security doors at the entry and living area
• Huge steel frame pergola with beautiful landscaped garden surroundings
• Double Garage with drive through access
• Established Espaliered fruit trees
For further enquiry please feel free to contact Cory Delvalle on 0411 798 589 or Haseeb Syed on 0402 717 084.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
Looking for value in a booming market, an investment with ready made tenants wanting to stay on ( currently on a month to month lease ) or possibly a property you could add immediate value to with some small cosmetic improvements then look no further than 19 Drummond Circuit, Derrimut. Approximately 26 squares in total and highlighted by impressive dimensions, all rooms in this home can only be described as extra oversized, with 4 massive bedrooms, huge kitchen, expansive meals and living/ entertaining spaces. Outside is a large alfresco amongst mature gardens and a small space for the kids to play. Other features include 2 bathrooms, huge laundry with direct access to outside, ducted heating, cooling, double remote garage with internal access and only a few doors down from magnificent Bothwell Park.

Description:
OFFERS CLOSED-SOLD
Nestled in a quite friendly neighbourhood, opposite a park and walking distance to Derrimut Village, this spacious property will suit all of your familys needs. Comprising of four bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, large open style kitchen with stone bench tops and glass splashbacks, spacious family room incorporating meals and dining and rumpus/theatre room. Other features include alfresco, low maintenance gardens, floating floors through living areas, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double remote garage with internal access, all this within walking distance to cafes, restaurants and recreational facilities.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Only through inspection will you truly be able to appreciate this fantastic Derrimut residence that has been so meticulously maintained and looked after that it appears to have just been built yesterday. Approximately 4 and a half years old and still under warranty, the home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms with mirrored BIRs with the master bedroom tucked away privately at the rear of the property offering a large WIR and twin vanity, oversize shower ensuite. A superb kitchen with 900mm appliances and industrial grade range hood overlooks the dining and family area that spills outside to the rear yard that features extensive concreted areas perfect for outdoor entertaining or alfresco dining amongst low maintenance gardens. Another highlight of this home is the extra large remote garage with bonus rear roller door access providing a secure storage space for a boat, caravan or additional vehicles. Other features include separate lounge / theatre room, soaring high ceilings, bullnose edge stone benches in kitchen, bathrooms and powder room, alarm, LED downlights with dimmers, electric roller shutters, ducted heating, internal access from garage, extra wide driveway, security doors, additional CAT6 connections, double glazed sound proof windows and so much more. A quiet family friendly street walking distance to all amenities with parkland only a few doors down completes this wonderful package otherwise known as 20 Bamburgh Street Derrimut.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Those that appreciate size and space will be immediately drawn to this lovely Derrimut residence that is highlighted by the biggest bedrooms you will ever find that are complimented by great sized living and entertaining spaces both inside and out. The enormous kitchen featuring stone benchtops, WIP, 900mm oven and cooktop, dishwasher plus bonus built in microwave and coffee machine is encompassed by the dining / family /rumpus or theatre room and these areas all intertwine with the alfresco and huge deck that provides the perfect setting for all occasions in the tranquility and peaceful surrounds of lovely gardens and feature bamboo fencing. With ample room for two zones you have the choice of relaxing with a drink on the outdoor couches, alfresco dining on those warm summer evenings or utilise the entire space when hosting the largest of family gatherings. To the rear of the property you will find a huge storage shed, or if you prefer remove the shed and replace with some new turf to create a great sized play area for the kids. Other features include 2 superb bathrooms , the master bedroom ensuite with twin vanities and an enormous shower that stretches its entire width, a main bathroom with frameless shower screen and spa, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, ducted vacuum, downlights, an abundance of storage options including huge fitted WIR in master and BIRs in remaining bedrooms, low maintenance gardens, gas line provision to alfresco, large laundry with linen closet, fold out ironing station and direct access to outside and double remote garage with internal access. Walking distance to transport, parkland and schools is the icing on the cake of this absolute beauty that delivers dimensions and spaces rarely seen and that are certain to impress and prove popular with buyers.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
In a quiet cul de sac yet so close to everything that Derrimut is so popular for proudly stands this striking double storey residence. Downstairs comprises a huge open plan kitchen/ meals / living area that spills out into the low maintenance concreted rear yard that is perfect for outdoor entertaining or utilise this area as a secure space for a boat, caravan or additional cars by taking advantage of this homes corner position and applying for a 2nd crossover (STCA) to access the rear. Another great feature of this lower level is the double doors to the rear of the garage that allows you to open them up and convert this space into another living area if you wish. A large laundry, powder room and an abundance of storage options complete this level. Moving upstairs you are greeted with a huge retreat area currently being used as a study and sitting area with great views overlooking the tranquil grasslands. Alternatively this space can be used as a rumpus/ recreation room with plenty of room for bar, billiard or ping pong table. Completing this level are three (3) huge bedrooms highlighted by the enormous master bedroom with WIR which are serviced by 2 lovely bathrooms. Other features include ducted heating, cooling, security roller shutters, contemporary flooring and walking distance to schools, parks , golf course , transport and Derrimut Village.

Too Good to Last
In Room Auction: Thursday 21st September 2017 at 7:00pm at our office located at Ray White Caroline Springs, Shop 8/234 Caroline Springs Boulevard, Caroline Springs
Situated in a sought after pocket of Derrimut, this stunningly well-presented home is close proximity to all amenities including Derrimut Village Shopping Centre, public transport, schools, parks and freeways.
Sitting on a generous block, approximately 517m2 this modern family home comprises of 4 spacious bedrooms, master with en-suite and walk-in robe and built-in robes to the rest, a well-appointed kitchen, a spacious family and meals area, a formal lounge, a light filled bathroom with separate toilet, and laundry room.
Further features of this home include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double car garage, landscaped low maintenance front and back yard.
Take advantage of this fabulous home and call to arrange your inspection today!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Just one word WOW. This truly special residence combines a contemporary and sophisticated interior highlighted by high ceilings and gorgeous flooring with a magical backyard oasis featuring huge alfresco with bluetooth receiver and ceiling speakers, an abundance of grassed area for the kids to play and fantastic shed with deck providing the perfect sunny spot to enjoy your favourite book or magazine in amongst the serenity and tranquillity of your very own beautiful gardens. This great family home comprises a superb kitchen with stone benches, extended breakfast bar and quality stainless steel appliances that overlooks the dining, family and childrens retreat or 2nd living area with all these areas intertwining with outside providing that indoor/outdoor living we all love. Sleeping quarters have been well thought of with small touches assuring a great nights rest. Four (4) spacious bedrooms, featuring retractable ceiling fans, double glazed sound proof windows, electric roller shutters, and an abundance of storage with the master providing a large WIR whilst the remaining bedrooms all have mirrored BIRs. Other features include two (2) superb bathrooms, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, designer lighting, alarm, double remote garage with internal access, landscaped gardens, double driveway and a premier location only a short stroll from all of Derrimuts amenities. Inspection highly recommended to appreciate the detail and superb condition of this lovely Metricon built residence.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Beautifully maintained and perfectly presented, every inch of this property both inside and out has been completed to a high standard and offers that turn key package that all newer home buyers dream of. The residence comprises a large stone benchtop kitchen that overlooks the dining and main living area and leads out to the amazing rear yard complete with pergola for alfresco dining and gorgeous low maintenance gardens featuring extensive concreting and artificial grass. Sleeping quarters comprise 4 spacious bedrooms, the master with WIR and ensuite whilst the 3 remaining bedrooms are all serviced by the quality main bathroom. Other features include a separate lounge, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, additional cooling system in living area, contemporary flooring, alarm, video intercom, quality window furnishings including roller shutters to selected windows, large laundry with direct access to outside, storage shed and double remote garage with internal access. Buyers that require side access or access to the rear yard can apply for a second crossover (STCA) as there is plenty of space to the side of the property for additional parking, or securely storing a boat or caravan. With everything already done for you, just move in relax and start enjoying the quality and luxury refinements this beautiful home offers.

Description:
Your New Home Awaits You
Century 21 Point Cook is proud to present this beautiful home & located in the best pocket of Derrimut, this amazing family home is sure to impress the toughest of critics. Positioned on one of the finest streets and on a big allotment of 536m2 approximately. From its spacious design flair to its flawless floor plan, this lovely home is an complimentary combination of space & style.
Comprising of:
* Four bedrooms, two bathrooms, double garage, Spacious master bedroom includes his/her walk in robe & an ensuite. All good sized bedrooms are fully fitted with built in robes.
* Through the landscaped front yard and a graceful porch, the entrance opens to a hallway with tiles.
* Multiple living areas include a formal lounge, dining area, informal family area next to kitchen overlooking the patio area.
* An open plan kitchen, 900mm stainless steel cook top, oven & dishwasher
* A large patio outside is to treat your family and friends with entertaining BBQ lunches or the quiet roast dinners.
* Beautifully landscaped back gardens with and lovely grassed area to relax after a day's hard work.
Extra features include ducted heating, high ceiling, split air-conditioner in the master bedroom and living area. Remote controlled double garage, alarm system with remote control access, quality window furnishings, 3.2 kw solar electricity system and 2000 litre water tank. With everything already done for you just move in, sit back, relax and indulge in this special home.
* Situated only moments away from schools, shops (Derrimut Village SC), parklands, freeway entrances and just 17 km's from Melbourne CBD.
Enquire today!
Contact Amar Billabati - 0498 999 192 or Sonal Dang - 0488 025 100
Note: Photo-id required at the inspection.

Description:
Location & Opportunity
Superbly situated opposite parkland and short stroll to Derrimut Village, this neat and low maintenance property is perfect for the first home owner or astute investor. Comprising of three bedrooms, ensuite to master, hostess style kitchen with stone benchtops, open plan meals area incorporating family room which leads to the outside decked area. Other features include ducted heating, stainless steel appliances with 900m wide free standing stove, garage with internal access.

Description:
Positioned For Lifestyle And Convenience!
This well maintained home is perfectly positioned close to all amenities Derrimut has to offer & will impress with its flexible layout & multiple living zones providing one lucky purchaser the opportunity to own their dream or alternatively ideal for an investor.
*Presenting approx 29sqs on approx 600m2 with side access potential.
*Comprising 3 generous bedrooms with potential for a 4th.
*Substantial master with W.I.R & double vanity ensuite
*Well equipped kitchen with stone bench tops, 900ml SS cooker.
*Adjoining meals & spacious light filled family room.
*Lounge/study area.
*Separate theatre room/rumpus.
*Double remote garage with internal access.
*Outside offers an alfresco & large backyard for those wanting that extra space.
*Also featuring ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, high ceilings, down lights.
*Conveniently located close to Derrimut primary school, community centre, sporting grounds & public transport.
*For any further information or to arrange an inspection please contact Nathan Hunt on 0409 853 503
Insights: 54 Windsor Boulevard, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Affordable Opportunity
First impressions are lasting as is the lifetime of enjoyment offered by this lovely home. Perfect for the first home buyer, astute investor or downsizer the home offers a generously-proportioned layout flowing over a single level for effortless living which includes 3 bedrooms, master with a walk in robe and ensuite whilst other are fitted with built ins, formal lounge room, spacious open plan kitchen lounge & dining, central bathroom and a sizeable yard.
Complete with ducted heating, SS appliances, dishwasher, a remote controlled double garage with internal access, wide side access potential and more. Its definitely a must see.
Private Sale.
PHOTO I.D REQUIRED AT ALL OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS.
